name: Siebel: Length of the Column should not exceed the length of the Field
associatedValueName: Size of field, name and size of the column
description:
This rule reports Business Component Fields having a length exceeding the length of the Column.
The properties compared are BC Field's TextLength and Siebel Column's Length.
output:
This rule reports Fields having a length exceeding the length of the column.
It provides the following information:
- BC Field full name
- the associated value is : (BC Field TextLength) -> Siebel Column Name (Column Length)
rationale:
Business Component Fields displays Column content, as well as accepts user input for insert and update.
Both length should be aligned to avoid truncation and unexpected behavior.
remediation: Align both length or use Text Length Override user property.
total: Number of added or modified Fields or Multi-Value Fields in Business Components
alternativeName: Siebel: Length of the Column should not exceed the length of the Field
